title: Lynda - Office 365: PowerPoint Essential Training with Jess Stra
description:
Lynda - Office 365: PowerPoint Essential Training with Jess Stratton 

Subjects:  Business Education + Elearning 
Software:  PowerPoint, Office 365 

3h 17m Appropriate for all Feb 09, 2015 | Uploaded in Feb 19, 2015 by 2boweb


In this course, author Jess Stratton teaches Office 365 subscribers the basics of creating, editing, working with, and sharing PowerPoint presentations. Learn to build a slideshow from scratch, and leverage PowerPoint templates and themes for quick construction. Jess shows how to add and edit text, images, graphs, video, and animation; format slides for consistency; and add speaker notes to ensure a smooth delivery. Plus, discover how to collaborate on changes and then share the final presentation via print, video, PDF, or email.
